description.narrative: Ghana health system has the necessary management tools to support effective service delivery at national and subnational levels

mailing-address.narrative: 4-8 Rangoon Close Ward 24 P.O. Box 5051 Cantoments Accra

sector.narrative: HSS - Health sector policy, planning and governance at national or sub-national levels
HSS - public finance management for Health
Immunization supply chain, including cold chain
Maternal and newborn care policy advocacy, evidence generation, national / subnational capacity development
Multisector aid for basic social services
Public health emergencies, including disease outbreaks

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Ghana health system has the necessary management tools to support effective service delivery at national and subnational levels

description.narrative: National Health Policy finalized and approved by cabinet, National Strategy for Water Sanitation and Hygiene for Health Facilities finalized, USD 4.7 million immunisation Cold Chain Equipment Optimization Platform (CCEOP) proposal approved by Gavi and 2.4 million children protected from circulating Vaccine Derive Polio Outbreak through emergency vaccination campaigns. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Registered facilities applying national service quality or clinical audit standards, in-service training or clinical supervision
Effective vaccine management (EVM) composite country score

At least 80% (on average) of health services delivery points submitted Health Management Information System reports according to national standards for reporting (e.g. on monthly or quarterly basis) , during the previous year. Note: health service delivery points, to be defined by each country (e.g. Facility, outreach and/or community) Note: measure should be text (Yes or No/Text...not number or percent)
Status of UNICEF supporting Health System Strengthening in context of COVID-19; disaggregated by type of support: (Yes/No) [COVID] i) Supply Chain management
Status of UNICEF supporting Health System Strengthening in context of COVID-19; disaggregated by type of support: (Yes/No) [COVID] iii) Human Resources for Health
Months with stockout of DTP containing vaccine at the national level (Target: 0 month)
Availability of stocks of polio vaccine (IPV and bOPV) at national and subnational level for use in routine immunisation programmes for at least 6 months
